Title: University of Cambridge Computer Lab Home Page
Body: Local information An overview of the Computer Laboratory List of members of the Department , also available for TABLE capable browsers All known information servers in Cambridge Cambridge University Information System All newsgroups available in the local news server Computer Lab newsgroups: ucam.cl.announce ucam.cl.misc ucam.cl.students Anonymous FTP area for cl.cam.ac.uk (also available via WWW ) Maps of the Computer Lab and How to get here Find someone using their Active Badge .
